body:
The Excalibur Saga is back! As some of you know, it was the first fan-fiction Avicus ever had!

Anyway, here's a short summary of what you'll be reading:

There are two regions, Blue and Red, fighting for a mythical and all mighty emerald sword named "Excalibur". The only way to get the sword, because it is frozen in place in the middle of the "Field of Wood" (the field that separates the two regions) is to destroy the other side's energy source, a heavily guarded and highly powerful piece of obsidian. It's an action/comedy story that follows me and a bunch of old/current/new Avicus players! It is loosely based of Nebula DTM.

 Anyway, why am I keeping you waiting? Go ahead and start reading. I'm going to release a couple each week. Oh, and if you like the story, please tell your friends about it, I'm trying to get more attention towards it so more people can enjoy it. :D

Season 1

Episode 1: http://pastebin.com/iBVj0azS

Episode 2: http://pastebin.com/1s5pr2Ed

Episode 10: http://pastebin.com/f90SsALD

Episode 7: http://pastebin.com/1NXVV0eK

replies.body:
Nice twist!
My only suggestion (though I don't think you can change it since these have already been written) is to add more descriptive details about the environments around them. The dialogue is great, but I find it hard to visualize their surroundings, which makes the story less compelling and engaging.

However, I'm really liking the plot so far and I'm looking forward to more ;)

However, I'm really liking the plot so far and I'm looking forward to more ;)

replies.body:
Ok, so since Episode 8 is really short... I'm releasing Episode 9 today too! Super-long action packed episode with a massive, mid-sentence cutoff cliffhanger.

You know what that means... Tommorow is the Season 1 finale! :D

replies.body:
How does one mlg water down a cliff? :P

Good story thou, keep it up :3
replies.body_tagged:
How does one mlg water down a cliff? :P

Good story thou, keep it up :3

replies.body: He wasn't on a cliff, he was in one of Ivy's flying boats. He abandoned it to get back down, and to get back down safely he MLG Watered, which is where you jump off of something, and right before you hit the ground, use a water bucket to place water. It's hard, but it will save you. :P
replies.body_tagged: He wasn't on a cliff, he was in one of Ivy's flying boats. It's hard, but it will save you. :P
